ygData.subject: Re: Marriage
ygData.msgSnippet: Oh dear. Well, all I can say is don t get too attached. I have a friend who plays a female on Rodcet but in Rl he is a guy so we flirt a bit (very little) in
ygData.messageBody:
Oh dear. Well, all I can say is don't get too attached. I have a friend
who plays a female on Rodcet but in Rl he is a guy so we flirt a bit
(very little) in tells and icq whenever we see each other on. I know a
bit about his life and he knows a bit about mine. I finally got sick of
playing my cleric so I moved to the Brell server. I play a Bard named
Dusky there. He said he was going to start a new character there so we
could play together again but I didn't see him in the game nor recieved
any other communication. So I missed him terribly for about a week on
Brell as he was the only real friend I had in the game. I recently
started a new job where I don't have hardly any time to play EQ anymore
so I guess I'm spared having to play with no friends. :P The whole week
on Brell anyone I met who called me Darlin caused an acute twist in my
heart. :( And this pain is caused from only a friend without any real
romantic involvement. I guess what I'm saying is be careful. If I were
you I wouldn't exchange any rl info and I'd keep it all contained to
roleplay. If we were talking about me however, I would have had my real
life all over the tells as I no longer am as interested in rolplaying
so go figure. Hmm, I guess what I'm really saying is don't get in too
deep because I think you'll just get hurt. I'm definitely not telling
you to ruin your fun though! *grin* I'm sure I wouldn't mind
roleplaying with some romantic minded fellow myself. (At least someone
who appeared so in game) I guess I'm middling more on the powergamer
side of the divide between that and rping. *sighs* I've been thinking,
that doesn't sound like that's acceptable in the guild though....

*For all on the list*--->Feel free to give me a tell in game if you
want and you're not a strict rper.

I think my bard is level...um.. (it's been days since I got a chance
to play! *sadness* )around level 7. If she's not level 7 yet, I'm sure
she's pretty darn close. :) Bloodless will be at the wedding, but
she'll have to turn in early since I have to get up early for work the
next day. I work in a sweatshop and I need all the rest I can get! haha
It's only till school starts thank goodness. Btw, I'm 25 since you
wanted to know from people who had a few seasons under their belts. :P
Good luck all! *smiles*
